sentence.Network_en: These nonrestrictive units had concrete floors on an interior steel frame.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些非抗震单元在内部为钢构架上是水泥地板.

sentence.Network_en: Place proper punctuation around nonrestrictive clauses, but do not place punctuation around restrictive clauses.
sentence.Network_cn: 在非限制性从句中可以使用标点, 但在限制性从句中则不可以使用.

sentence.Network_en: When a nonrestrictive clause appears in the middle of a sentence, place commas around it.
sentence.Network_cn: 当非限制性成分在句子中间出现时, 应当在它前面和后面加逗号.

means.word_mean: 1. not limiting the reference of a modified word or phrase;

sentences.sentence: "the nonrestrictive clause in `I always buy his books, which have influenced me greatly,' refers to his books generally and adds an additional fact about them"
